prHeadline: NIL Technology Introduces Flat, Multifunctional Optics Platform for 3D Sensing and LiDAR Applications
headlineTxt: Jul 13, 2021, 08:32 ETNIL Technology Introduces Flat, Multifunctional Optics Platform for 3D Sensing and LiDAR ApplicationsEuropean Innovation Council (EIC). NILT creates competitive advantages with flat optics in optical applications for 3D sensing, consumer electronics, machine vision, autonomous vehicles, and VR/AR displays; all solutions made by diffractive optical elements (DOE) and metalenses/meta optical elements (MOE). NILTMore news about: NIL Technology
